caption.p: Potential of various n-hexane extract of M. oleifera seeds hydrogels on the healing of excision wound expressed in percentage. Mean ± SD, analyzed by Two- way ANOVA (Analysis of variance) followed by Bonferroni’s multiple comparison test post hoc analysis; a*** < 0.001 vs. control; b*** < 0.001 test drugs vs. standard until 12th day; c** < 0.01 5% hexane hydrogel vs. standard at 13th day; d* < 0.05 10% hexane hydrogel vs. standard at 13th day.
